mapper.sql: id, title, author, description, publisher, isbn, publication_date, page, language, img_url, rating, favourite, review
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, img_url AS imgUrl FROM books WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter}, '%') ORDER BY title ASC

SELECT b.*, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(g.name SEPARATOR ',') FROM genres g INNER JOIN book_pivot_genres pg ON g.id = pg.genre_id WHERE pg.book_id = b.id ) AS genres, IF(EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM bookshelf_pivot_books bb INNER JOIN bookshelves bs ON bs.id = bb.bookshelf_id WHERE bb.book_id = b.id AND bs.user_id = #{userId} ), 1, 0) AS isFavourite, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_comments bc WHERE bc.book_id = b.id ) AS commentCount, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_ratings br WHERE br.book_id = b.id ) AS ratingCount FROM books b WHERE b.id = #{bookId}

SELECT DISTINCT b.id, b.title, b.img_url AS imgUrl FROM books b INNER JOIN book_pivot_genres pg ON b.id = pg.book_id WHERE pg.genre_id IN ( SELECT genre_id FROM book_pivot_genres WHERE book_id = #{bookId} ) AND b.id != #{bookId};
